projects.title: ezOD
projects.description: A Chrome extension for vitc students to quickly check their On-Duty (OD) attendance. It scans your VTOP attendance records and generates a summary table with OD counts.

projects.title: QuadTasks
projects.description: QuadTask is an Obsidian plugin that allows you to create eisenhower matrix tasks and manage them efficiently.

projects.title: 100xPrompts
projects.description: AI prompt library, enhancer, and Chrome extension built with React, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion.

projects.title: Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: A project created as the final project for the course 'Data Structures and Algorithms', where I implemented various algorithms and data structures and created a visualizer for them.

projects.title: YouTube Playlist duration counter
projects.description: Chrome extension that calculates the total duration of a YouTube playlist. This helps users quickly understand how long the entire playlist will take to watch without needing to manually add up the individual video durations.

projects.title: YT Pause On Switch
projects.description: YTPauseOnSwitch automatically pauses YouTube videos when you switch tabs or windows and resumes playback when you return.

projects.title: Syllabus PDF to Markdown Converter
projects.description: A user-friendly desktop application that converts VIT theory syllabus PDFs into structured Markdown files, making it easier to manage course materials.

projects.title: LCD simulation
projects.description: A simulation of 2*16 LCD grid that helps understand how LCD displays work at a basic level.
